tags.name: Single sign-on (SSO) connectors
tags.description: The following APIs are used to manage single sign-on (SSO) connectors. Your application can use these well configured SSO connectors to authenticate users and sync user attributes from external identity providers (IdPs).

get.description: Get a list of SSO connectors with pagination

200.description: A list of SSO connectors. In addition to the raw SSO connector data, a copy of fetched/parsed IdP detail configs and a copy of connector factory's data will be returned.

422.description: Unprocessable content error. At lease one of the given input fields is invalid or IdP connection can not be verified with the given connection config.

get.description: Get an SSO connector by ID

200.description: Returns raw SSO connector data along with a copy of fetched/parsed IdP detail configs and a copy of connector factory's data

delete.description: Delete an SSO connector by ID

patch.description: Update an SSO connector by ID

422.description: Unprocessable content error. At lease one of the update fields is invalid or IdP connection can not be verified with the given connection config.
